item.title: Highscores Help please!
item.dc:creator: @prayerhunta prayerhunta
item.description:
@prayerhunta wrote:

Hey so I am adding highscores to my pi visidia server, the highscore that goes on my site. I am almost complete just am a little stuck on where to enter some of the coding. I have been following this TUT —> http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,364364.0.html , I got to Chapter 3, Step 3. I end up getting errors when I compile. someone please help, reply here pc me or skype me SKYPE: thefatman101

[center]---------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]

Example;

Chapter 3 - Server sided
Step 1:
Open the highscores files you downloaded again and add the “com” folder as well as “sql.java” into your server files.

Step 2:
Than open SQL.java and search for this

public static void createConnection() {
                try {
                        Class.forName("com.mysql.jdbc.Driver").newInstance();
                        con = DriverManager.getConnection(
                                        "jdbc:mysql://localhost/highscore", "USERNAME", "PASSWORD");
                        stmt = con.createStatement();
                } catch (Exception e) {
                        e.printStackTrace();
                }
        }

Once again you need to edit the username and password just like last time, save and compile.
[size=18pt]
I AM STUCK FROM HERE DOWN!!![/size]

Step 3:
Now we need to create a saving method so that it updates when players log out.
Fist open server class (server.java) and in the run method

Add:
